body:
https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/pull/638

you want to do a quick test to help @krnlde
I'm already in bed, will do tomorrow :) thanks man!
thanks @krnlde i will resolve the other issue, when you wake up tmr too üëç
I can confirm this issue is closed by `3.28.15-beta.1` ü•á
Thanks for being so quick about every issue :D you're awesome!
no worries, thanks for testing. i really appreciated your help on this.
i will need your help on making isValid solid so i never break it again... üôè (help me testing)

Hey man, we have a new issue related to this one. Compare the reset behavior of version [3.28.15](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-reset-forces-all-fields-to-be-changed-jhu0j) with [3.29.0](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-reset-forces-all-fields-to-be-changed-z5u17).

To do that go to both codesandboxes, enter a "first name", hit reset and see the `isValid` debug output. It should both be `false` since the default will be an empty string. In `3.29.0` however it'll resolve to `true`.
it's back again... @krnlde I will take a look first thing in the morning.
No hustle, `3.28.15` works without any issues :) Thank you!
`3.29.1-beta.1` i think that was the fix. tested on my end
In the above example it works!
I forgot to reset the valid field during `reset`
